I'll definitely make sure to reach out to the organizers and iron out all the details. I think I'll create a fun, casual invitation to get everyone excited about the event. Maybe something like, "It's time to escape the ordinary and celebrate our success! Join us for an afternoon of fun, games, and team bonding as we mark our recent product launches and my three months as Senior Marketing Manager at XYZ Inc."

I want to set a relaxed, celebratory tone for the event, and make sure everyone knows that it's a well-deserved break from our usual workload. I might also include some teasers about the activities we'll be doing, to build anticipation and curiosity.

For promotion, I'll probably send out a company-wide email with all the details, and then follow up with some reminders and updates on our team's internal chat channel. I might also ask our team members to RSVP by a certain date, so I can get an accurate headcount for the organizers.
